types.title: Types of cookies

essential.title: Essential Cookies

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Track your activity to deliver targeted advertisements

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: The information and specifications provided for this vehicle are for illustrative purposes. For more accurate information, we recommend verifying the vehicle directly with the seller.
